mapper.select: select id, name, phone, email, student_id, student_class, semester, department,major1, major2 from User where deldate is null ORDER BY regdate desc;
mapper.update: update User As U inner join Admin As A on A.user_id = U.id set U.status = 0 where A.id = #{id};
UPDATE User SET deldate=now(), status = -1 WHERE id = #{id}
